text: Roman Vladimirovich Krivulkin (; ; born 18 February 1996) is a Belarusian professional footballer. He plays for Slutsk.Player's profile at Pressball ==Career== Born in a small village in Vitebsk Oblast, Belarus, he moved to Saint Petersburg, Russia at the age of 6. After studying for a few years in FC Zenit Academy, he signed with CSKA Moscow in 2015. Unable to push his way to the senior team, he returned to Belarus in 2017 and signed with Krumkachy Minsk.A Belarusian from CSKA came to Krumkachy on trial ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Belarusian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:PFC CSKA Moscow players Category:FC Krumkachy Minsk players Category:FC Torpedo Minsk players Category:FC Slutsk players
title: Roman Krivulkin
